colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAM SO SO'I 'DOD SBYAR GYI BSANGS SPYI SGER MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BAS BZOD BRI DGOS PA MI 'DUG KYANG, GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DI 'DRA RE DGOS PA BYUNG TSE YI GE MANG PO ZHIG BKLAGS KYANG LAS 'BREL @005B MED DANG, PHAL CHER SPYIR KHYAB PA MA ME ZHIG LAS SHING THOGS MDZUG GU LTAR GNANG THOG TU KHEL NGES SHIG MI YOD 'DUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN PA SRID SNYAM NAS, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MA BSRES SHING, MING GSAL GYI RIGS DOR TE SKABS DON 'DRIL BAR BKOD PA'O,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
